item.title: About
item.description: As a systems analyst with a diverse background in the veterinary and laboratory fields, Mikael brings a unique perspective and set of skills to their role supporting Linux workstations and servers for research labs. With over 8 years of experience as a veterinary technician and pathology assistant, Mikael has a thorough understanding of animal health and disease processes, as well as a strong foundation in laboratory techniques and analysis. In their current role as a systems analyst, Mikael is responsible for supporting and maintaining the Linux infrastructure for research labs, ensuring that the technology is running smoothly and efficiently.
